name: v0-clone-agui
description: AI App Generator using AG-UI Protocol

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.deploy:backend: cd backend && npm run build && wrangler deploy
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm run build && wrangler pages deploy out --project-name=v0-clone-frontend
